original_title: 笑嗷喜剧人2之冒牌杀手
overview: The film tells the story of Dai Xiaolong who grew up as a comedy star by acting cleverly in his place. He fell into a murder case and became disillusioned. The comedy class also disbanded. Dai Xiaolong, who was hiding in Tibet, turned into a killer by chance. In every corner of the city, it triggered a series of hilarious stories.
title: 笑嗷喜剧人2之冒牌杀手
